arts.ttl: How to watch Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid on TV tonight for free
arts.sum: Arsenal take on Atletico Madrid in the Champions League on Tuesday night and hope to make it three wins from as many outings, and UK viewers can tune in for free

arts.ttl: Arsenal in bizarre row with Atletico Madrid ahead of Champions League clash
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid have filed an official UEFA complaint against Arsenal after being left without hot water at the Emirates on Monday. To their dismay, Atleti's players soon realised that the hot water was not working at the ground, leaving the players and Diego Simeone disgruntled.

arts.ttl: Pundit reveals key change to Atletico Madrid’s system ahead of Arsenal game
arts.sum: Arsenal will face Atletico Madrid in the Champions League tonight, with pundit Adrian Clarke offering a detailed preview of how the Spanish side is likely to approach the match. arts.ttl: Where Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid is on TV for free as Champions League game not on TNT Sports
arts.sum: Arsenal continue their UEFA Champions League campaign on Tuesday as they face the La Liga side at the Emirates Stadium.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid complains to UEFA hours before facing Arsenal
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid have submitted a formal complaint to UEFA after an unexpected issue at the Emirates Stadium left their players unable to take a proper shower following their training session on the eve of their Champions League match against Arsenal. arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta shows his true colours with Arsenal gesture before Atletico Madrid clash

arts.ttl: 'Not what people expect' - Why Arsenal vs. Atletico will not be defence vs. defence
arts.sum: Arsenal and Atletico Madrid should not play out a drab goalless draw that some perhaps expect from Tuesday's Champions League clash, Gunners expert Charles Watts explains to Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Arsenal apologise to Atletico about hot water failure
arts.sum: Arsenal apologise to Atletico Madrid after a hot water failure at Emirates Stadium sees the Spanish side heading to their hotel for showers following a training session.

arts.ttl: Why Atletico Madrid Have Launched ‘Official Complaint’ Against Arsenal
arts.sum: The situation could add extra flavour to the pair’s Champions League encounter.
